segments.text: Observing this scene, I see the everyday routine turning upside down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is absorbed in drying that plate, apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on, and water is spilling everywhere uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing fast, soaking the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's ankle-deep in it without a clue, which frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the upper cabinet swings open with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing the stool, body extended upward precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could tip backward any moment; my heart races thinking about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies while balancing a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork in mischief brings a smile despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a tidy yard, sunlight streaming in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how the outside calm ignores the inside turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR
